title: Best of The Herd: Jul 23, 2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: Jul 23, 2019
description:
Colin defends Odell Beckham Jr.'s right to talk about his exit from the Giants because they made it dysfunctional.  He says Ezekiel Elliott makes a lot of noise and noisy NFL teams do not win.  Warren Sharp of Sharpfootballanalysis.com explains why Melvin Gordon should not be paid.  Plus, former NFL DB and Scout Bucky Brooks tells Colin why Patrick Mahomes is exactly like Brett Favre!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
